::Rex::

Rex silently follows Battera, wondering what was wrong with him. He was 
letting a Predacon out of the ship, after she had plenty of time to scan, and 
plant bugs in the bridge and in her quarters. As he follows her, he taps his 
wrist, as screen poping up as his wrist computer activates. Tapping a few 
buttons, he activates a complete scan of the ship, to check for any foreign 
objects.

Rex walks faster, coming up to Battera. "Is there any reason for this walk or 
do you just like to move about?" he asks her, trying to sound friendly.
